product_name: The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag
long_description: Designed to keep you warm on frigid winter nights while reducing the weight you need to haul by day, The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag is insulated with high-performance Heatseeker(TM) Pro. Continuous-filament and cut-staple Heatseeker Pro polyester insulation maximizes thermal performance to keep you warm down to 0degF for 4-season backpacking. Offset quilted bottom reduces cold spots where your body rests against the cool ground. Efficient design delivers optimal warmth in sub-zero temperatures without sacrificing compressibility. Draft collar and shaped hood help retain warmth. Pad loops give you a way to attach the bag to a sleeping pad (pad not included). The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag comes with a compression sack and storage sack.
short_description: Designed to keep you warm on frigid winter nights while reducing the weight you need to haul by day, The North Face Snow Leopard Sleeping Bag is insulated with high-performance Heatseeker(TM) Pro.
